title: Joseph’s Final Acts and Death
summary: Genesis 50 concludes the book with Jacob’s burial in Canaan. Joseph reassures his brothers of his forgiveness. The chapter ends with Joseph’s death in Egypt, after reaffirming God’s promise to bring Israel back to the Promised Land.

faq.question: What did Joseph say to comfort his brothers after Jacob’s death?
faq.answer: He told them not to be afraid and reminded them that God used everything for good.

faq.question: What were Joseph’s final words about the future?
faq.answer: He prophesied that God would bring the Israelites out of Egypt and asked to have his bones carried back to the Promised Land.
